data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Navarra.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary: On average, 50 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Navarra words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Navarra to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Segundo Ensanche
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Segundo Ensanche, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.focus_label: Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain
data.section_summary:
the county of Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain has a population of 644,600.

We estimate Navarra has 10,322 people who might know Jesus, 488,016 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 146,262 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Navarra, Comunidad Foral de Navarra, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
